name: Rainbow man (savny)
description:
Rainbow man is a hyper-casual endless android game.

Here, the player has to help Rainbow man get past the same colored Rainbow wall as the Rainbow man, Tap on the right side of the screen to move the Rainbow man to the right and left side to move him to the left. and don't hit the other walls.

Keep track of your score and try to get the highest score ever.

Good luck!
